title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE could be released as a Slim model next year
description: We are about three months away from the unveiling of the Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, but the Galaxy S25 FE has also made headlines lately, with the latest report by The Elec claiming Samsung does indeed have plans to launch the Galaxy S25 FE next year and is considering launching it as a Slim model. The publication also claims that the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE will pack a screen measuring 6.7" diagonally - the same as the Galaxy S24 FE introduced last month. Moreover, the Korean conglomerate could make the Galaxy S25 FE's battery thinner by making it wider to launch the phone...
excerpt: The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE is 8mm thick, and it remains to be seen how thin the Galaxy S25 FE will be. We are about three months away from the unveiling of...
text: We are about three months away from the unveiling of the Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, but the Galaxy S25 FE has also made headlines lately, with the latest report by The Elec claiming Samsung does indeed have plans to launch the Galaxy S25 FE next year and is considering launching it as a Slim model. The publication also claims that the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE will pack a screen measuring 6.7" diagonally - the same as the Galaxy S24 FE introduced last month. Moreover, the Korean conglomerate could make the Galaxy S25 FE's battery thinner by making it wider to launch the phone with a slim design. Samsung Galaxy S24 FE The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE is 8mm thick, and it remains to be seen how thin the Galaxy S25 FE will be. Regarding the chipset, the S24 FE came with the Exynos 2400e SoC, but the S25 FE is rumored to have a Dimensity chip at the helm. You can expect to hear more about the Galaxy S25 FE in the coming months. In the meantime, you can read our Samsung Galaxy S24 FE review to learn more about it. Source (in Korean)
html:
We are about three months away from the unveiling of the Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, but the Galaxy S25 FE has also made headlines lately, with the latest report by The Elec claiming Samsung does indeed have plans to launch the Galaxy S25 FE next year and is considering launching it as a Slim model.

The publication also claims that the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE will pack a screen measuring 6.7" diagonally - the same as the Galaxy S24 FE introduced last month. Moreover, the Korean conglomerate could make the Galaxy S25 FE's battery thinner by making it wider to launch the phone with a slim design.


Samsung Galaxy S24 FE

The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE is 8mm thick, and it remains to be seen how thin the Galaxy S25 FE will be. Regarding the chipset, the S24 FE came with the Exynos 2400e SoC, but the S25 FE is rumored to have a Dimensity chip at the helm.

You can expect to hear more about the Galaxy S25 FE in the coming months. In the meantime, you can read our Samsung Galaxy S24 FE review to learn more about it.

Source (in Korean)
